      • getIndexedSearchPackageName

        public static java.lang.String getIndexedSearchPackageName(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Gets interface impls searching index. e.g, if the package name is "com.abc.foo.pkg", index value is 2, the searching package will be "com.abc". if index value is 3, the searching package will be "com".
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • readFilesToBytes

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,byte[]> readFilesToBytes(java.lang.String pathName)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        read given pathName resources to byte[] map from classpath, including jar or zip files.
        if pathName is a abstract file name, will read this file to byte and return.
        if path name is folder name, will read all files under this folder and return byte[] map.
        Parameters:
        pathName -
        Returns:
        Map
        String: file name
        byte[]: file content in byte[]
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
